website_summaries.verdict: An environmentally-friendly option that's well made and nicely crafted. Worth the bit of maintenance it takes to increase its durability for eco-conscious consumers.
pros: Made entirely of bamboo, a sustainable and easily renewable material
Has a deep top and extra long 14-inch handle
Durably made, yet reasonably lightweight to use
cons: Not dishwasher-safe – requires hand washing and thorough drying to prevent the bamboo from peeling or cracking

customer_reviews.title: Pieces started falling off
customer_reviews.text: this ladle has glued pieces of bamboo. Pieces started falling apart within few days of use. Quality is cheap. Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooking spoon, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is really excellent. It's pretty much as described: well-finished (very nice to hold in hand while cooking), 14 inches, with a large bowl. I used it to make some spicy Indian food: it was just the right length for stirring inside a big (8qt) pot, and even better, it came clean easily in warm soapy water with no fuss, with only light staining from the spices. (Turmeric will stain just about anything, so this is an expected and acceptable result.) I can recommend it highly, it's way better than my older 14 inch large wooden cooking spoons. I haven't found anything better for my use.
customer_reviews.author: CSX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using wood utensils for some time In an effort to rid all the cheap plastic ones but have kept using the plastic spaghetti one I had. I was so glad to find this. I was worried it wouldn’t hold much due to it being pretty flat but it gets the job done well & has held up great so far. I love that I can place it over the boiling water to to help keep it from boiling over. Great product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean; Very Stiff
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look like it'll hold speghetti, but it does a fine job. It also cleans very very easy. I only hand wash, but it does not morph. It's not as soft to the touch as my other bamboo spatulas, and I worry about scratching my pots, but after using it a few times, I don't see any scratches.
customer_reviews.author: ROTC69

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Works Not So Well
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this server seems high enough, but the usability is just too low. I rarely make actual spaghetti noodles, preferring instead smaller pastas like shells, penne, or rotini. For these pastas, this spoon just doesn't work. It won't pick up any of the pasta, and when you do manage to get something on the spoon, it's a balancing act to keep it there until you plate it. If you want something that looks good, by all means purchase this as a decorative piece. If you want something that works, look for something with more depth to it to make grabbing your pasta easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pittman Photography

customer_reviews.title: One piece, no glue, wich means dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's one piece and not glued together. I have one piece bamboo spoons that are so old. I throw them in the dish washer all the time without any issues. A couple of months ago, I bought the Amazon bamboo spoons.... absolute junk. Both fell apart with in 4 weeks because they are pieces of bamboo glued together.
customer_reviews.author: DFB

customer_reviews.title: I want to give this a higher rating...
customer_reviews.text: This product has the makings of a great spatula: It is sturdy, and cleans well. Unfortunately, for a straight wooden spatula, which is of course not flexible, the blade is simply too large and most of all too thick at the end to be useful for most applications. It is too unwieldy to move things about with precision in a frying pan. Would love to see a smaller version. For now, this one has been benched and sits unused in the kitchen tool drawer.
customer_reviews.author: E Max

customer_reviews.title: Best Wooden Spatula I’ve Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I love that this spatula is coated, so it’s not porous and soaking up water when cleaning or cooking with it! It’s the perfect shape for chopping up meats when cooking. This is my “go to” cooking utensil. Super sturdy too! I imagine I’ll be using this for years to come before it’ll have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: The product is good! I was hoping to use it to flip eggs and it doesn't work all that well but works great for everything else. When my spatula came, it was damaged and the company sent me a new one within a week. Really like this product and seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this spoon. I use it for cooking everything! EVERYTHING! I don't know what I did before. It's made me buy more wooden utensils. I hope they hold up to the standard.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie lynch

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Full Sized Bamboo Ladle
customer_reviews.text: I love burnished bamboo cooking utensils, they don't mind heat or the dishwasher, last for years, and can be used with traditional and non-stick pans. But while you can find various spoons, spatulas, and tongs very easily, full-sized ladles are hard to come by. So I was thrilled when I saw this one from Totally Bamboo. Since this is made of several pieces of bamboo laminated together, do make sure you dry it after washing to prevent splitting.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cohen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is cool
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, I have been looking for a while for a bamboo ladle with a scoop deep enough you can actually scoop something up. I had been using a measuring cup for soups and stews, which works out pretty well, but if you have company it's not what I want to use to serve with. It's nice and smooth, feels like liquid would probably not suck up if you left it sitting in a pot of soup etc.. The handle is too long for my silverware drawer if that's somewhere you would choose to store yours and you have size constrictions. I really like this ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Not for the toilet, though.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. The last one lasted 9 years before my 2 year-old put it in the pot that isn’t for cooking. I felt it was best to dispose of it after that. But I bought another out of my purchase history because I didn’t want to risk getting a lower-quality one by search.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Drahos

customer_reviews.title: Good long spoon
customer_reviews.text: I do not like wooden utensils but I need this one - I specially have chosen la little long size. Recently I found out if you put wooden spoon on the top of the pot with boiling pasta/dumplings/potato/whatever (!) you can avoid foaming of your cooking and the range will be clean! It works!
customer_reviews.author: iii

customer_reviews.title: Best quality bamboo
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class bamboo spoon. It has a great finish which makes it easy to use and clean, perfect size, too.
customer_reviews.author: Art lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and efficient ladle
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Smooth and attractive. The bowl could have been a little wider, but it works just fine, and probably serves a proper portion as opposed to the huge portions I like to serve. I have no hesitation recommending this super Bamboo ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Trubrit

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight but a bit thick...the scoop end could be thinner. Seems to be made well though and wood utensils are essential for enameled cast iron, so ultimately happy with this laddle
customer_reviews.author: Chad or Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Too flat to use as spaghetti server
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was almost flat. It would not be useful to use as a spaghetti server.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy to finally have a bamboo ladle! It looks beautiful and sturdy, I can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Three Hearts

customer_reviews.title: A must for pasta or spiralized veggies
customer_reviews.text: How can we not have had one of these spaghetti servers? I ordered one after we started spiralizing our veggies. The quality of the spoon is great! This spoon as helped separate the noodles and make it easier to serve them after being cooked.
customer_reviews.author: JetNoise

customer_reviews.title: Need one bigger
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a ladle like this for a really long time. Can't seem to find one bigger so this is what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: It works better than a utensil without notches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I needed a pasta scoop, and the bamboo goes with the stuff in my kitchen. This is more of a paddle with notches on the side, rather than a deeper scoop that I'm used to. I tried it in lieu of just rejecting it because it was different. It works better than a utensil without notches, but for serving, I prefer the deeper ones.
customer_reviews.author: nlh

customer_reviews.title: Love Totally Bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Totally Bamboo is the maker I look for when buying bamboo utensils. They are both beautiful and beautifully made. Every piece I have has a burnished finish that is truly smooth and soft in the hand, but is solid (some feel downright heavy) enough to stand up to a lot of use. Yes, they cost more than Joyce Chen or some other bamboo products, but you definitely get what you pay for and they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: KaiinOK

customer_reviews.title: splitting
customer_reviews.text: I used this 2 times and the wood is coming apart.. I did not leave it set in liquid.. I washed it and dried it right away when finished.. very disappointed as I loved the way it works..
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Handle
customer_reviews.text: Totally Bamboo's utensils have a slick finish which makes them hard to grip. I found the two products I had so frustrating I just tossed them in a donation bin.
customer_reviews.author: Yay Jin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this and do love what I see about the company, but the prongs aren’t long enough so they barely “grab” pasta which is incredibly frustrating. The prongs need to be longer and skinnier.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: for when you mean business
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, hefty, no-nonsense spoon by any standard, though just a touch shallow for its size. It still holds a good amount, though, perfect for tasting soup. Its handle is nicely turned with a comfortable grip. So many bamboo utensils are marketed as a sustainable alternative to wood but skimp on utility; not this puppy.
customer_reviews.author: philodygmn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a spaghetti spoon and I don’t like plastic or metal so I struggled to find one that was wood/bamboo. I think it was worth the extra money. It looks lovely out on my counter in a utensil crock and it feels very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Stephens

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful natural ladle
customer_reviews.text: This ladle seems sturdy, as the wood is thick. Good sized bowl with a little slot on one side to aid in pouring. It is useful and beautiful. Must be hand wadhed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This spoon looks high quality. I got this for my daughter’s Easter basket (yes my kids are a bit spoiled) and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kapaxmom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Best I have seen. I would reccomend to anyone. Should last for many years with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I so like this! Better than plastic and the handle feels ...
customer_reviews.text: I so like this! Better than plastic and the handle feels great. The bowl is rather shallow compared to plastic spaghetti servers but that doesn't make a difference. It's also easier for storage because of the shape. It's a really pretty utensil too, if you like to put your stuff in a holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect big wooden spoon
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal big wooden spoon. It is perfect for cooking a sauce and can be used for just about any hot or cold dish. Amazon also stands by the product quality. When this spoon first arrived, it had a flaw. Being that its all natural bamboo it looked split on the top. Amazon quickly exchanged the item and the replacement spoon is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and goes well with the rest of my bamboo utensils
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! This ladle is easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! This ladle is easy to handle, the right length and depth...and it's made of wood! I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: jeimy walters

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape but it broke appart after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ladle but I've only had it for a couple of months and it is now broken and cracked! The curve form is shaped by many little pieces of wood glued together and it has a very nice shape and size, but it came unglued after just a few uses. I NEVER put my bamboo stuff in the diswasher, but even then it broke after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Neely

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Small prongs so I don’t feel it picks up much spaghetti. Otherwise it’s study and well made
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Spoon
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a prize for the winner of a Chili Cook-off and the winner loved it
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Woodward

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Sturdy, well made bamboo ladle. Just what I wanted to replace worn out wood spoons
customer_reviews.author: Kay Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Thanks, again and again...
customer_reviews.text: And now, another great product to use with my cookware..!..I stumbled onto these Silchef products and ,boy, purchasing the professional spatulas, wooden spoon and the ladle have made a great difference while cooking... PKR Kentucky
customer_reviews.author: PKR

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle
customer_reviews.text: A great ladle. Capacity comparable with regular plastic/metal ones. The coating makes it easy to wash and protects from excessive moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent restaurant kitchen-use quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent restaurant kitchen-use quality! Long handle works great for deep or wide pots. Like company bio. Feel good about purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Hruby

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle. The flat bottom lets you sit it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ladle. The flat bottom lets you sit it on a surface without worrying about it spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the bamboo one better than the plastic ones I have been using for years
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape but it broke appart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the spaghetti doesn't get tangled at all, BUT I've only had it for a couple of months and it is now broken and cracked! The curve form is shaped by many little pieces of wood glued together and it has a very nice shape and size, but it came unglued after just a few uses. I NEVER put my bamboo stuff in the diswasher, but even then it broke after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Neely

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  1/2 cup ladle works well.
customer_reviews.text: Large size Ladle. Holds exactly 1/2 cup. Appears to be lacquered, but I wish it wasn't as I prefer to use mineral oil on wood/bamboo utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Mark42Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spaghetti server to replace a plastic cheapie. I didn't expect such a high quality product. The handle length is generous (no hot water splashing on your arm!) and it's pretty to boot. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Anni Z

customer_reviews.title: Shallow Cup
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this item I was hoping that it would have a deeper "cup" part. I was disapointed to learn it has a very shallow one. A very deceptive picture but it still works, just not as effective as I would have prefered.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Regan

customer_reviews.title: Very shallow spoon
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but is a very shallow spoon. Seems it would be easier to use hands to dish out noodles.
customer_reviews.author: SanFranciscoLilac

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the pieces fell off causing a hole after a few washes....
customer_reviews.author: Chi Lichia

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely longer than the other wooden and bamboo spoons I have, which is handy. Also serves better since it has a reasonable depth to the spoon bowl. Bought originally to bring my purchase price up in order to avoid shipping costs. Definitely worth it! Extremely well made and it's holding up well. Worth the price since it lasts better than cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Best Pasta spoon out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is big. It is sturdy. It has not stained after three months of use. I will never use wood or plastic spoons again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift for the wife. I haven't heard her mention anything negative about it so it must be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Good size and hard to find shape. Although, being of bamboo I can't help feel like I'm on Gilligan's Island when I use this ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladle
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for me and 1 for my Mom and they are big ladle and just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marti S

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This spoon doesn't stain or soak up odors. I used butcher block treatment on it for the first time and it serves well. Just don't put ANY wood utensil in the dishwasher. This spoon hand washes easily and looks great also.
customer_reviews.author: bbubba

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite work
customer_reviews.text: The product is of high quality, but there is not enough of a curve or depth on the prongs to grab spaghetti pasta well. I'll have to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice and sturdy ladle. It looks more expensive than what it is. It is definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and big and sturdy. I love using it for my sauces. The head is has about a 2in radius so it's a wonderful size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is too flat
customer_reviews.text: The spoon is flat and doesn't pick up the spaghetti very well
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo pieces fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom, she makes congee with it. The glue melted while cooking it, the piece on the tip of the ladle fell off. I guess it'll work if it used under a certain degree, but it can't even handle water boiling point? The ladle broke within 2 weeks of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Sh.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have been switching to wooden utensils so our nonstick pans would not be ruined my metal ones. This utensil is well made and durable. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: AUDRA BUTLER

customer_reviews.title: wood splits after less than 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: used for cooking scrambled eggs and ground beef in skilet, did not hold up for long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these spoons
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these spoons! they have a nice coating on them that makes cleaning them easier. Quality and size werea big worry for me when ordering but they are my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd have a bamboo spoon, but it seems very sturdy. Previous spaghetti serves have lost their teeth over time, so am hopeful this one will last. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sticklbooks

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after one month
customer_reviews.text: Had this for one month and one of the ends broke off without me doing anything to it. I hardly used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Boan

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. However, it is kind of cumbersome, which makes it messier than ladles I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Pasta Server with extra long handle
customer_reviews.text: Loving this. the first one I received had one of the teeth broken off, but I sent it back and Amazon sent me a new one. This has an unusually long handle and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: elb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a totally wood/bamboo ladel for a long time. I don't like using plastic or metal tools when cooking because I'm just like that - natural is best I guess? Im very happy! and the little pouring indentation is perfect. Im a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: G Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product and fast shipping. I certainly order more.
customer_reviews.author: Renai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Bamboo Ladle and the picture is accurate! We used this ladle for our sauna.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: good spoon
customer_reviews.text: This spoon was recommended in Cook's Illustrated. It is excellent a useful size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Stephen Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ladle doesn't seem to scoop a lot but it works for what I need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Krisha N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful implement - much better looking than the picture would indicate. Stands up to hard use, too. Wonderful if you're trying to cut down on the amount of metal in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ian

customer_reviews.title: when you find it on Amazon you will have a good day
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I ordered.This is just what I wanted and I was lucky and happy to find it available from Amazon at a good price and brought right to my door!
customer_reviews.author: garlic heart

customer_reviews.title: Great in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This ladle is fabulous. Being environmental concerned over our use of plastics and the leeching of chemicals into the food we prepare helped me choose this product made from bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Z

customer_reviews.title: I love this - thick
customer_reviews.text: I love this - thick, sturdy, - not flimsy like a lot of wooden utensils. Also smooth - no rough edges on it. One of my favs in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Braddock

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expected it to have more of a scoop but it’s really flat.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ladle. Good quality bamboo. nice color, not exactly the color shown in this picture. Matches other totally bamboo products perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Sop Ladle
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this soup lable. It is substantial and the bamboo is finished off very nicely. I make a lot of soup so this will definitely get used.

customer_reviews.title: Goid
customer_reviews.text: The spoon looks great. Nice color of bamboo. Great quality. Normally this type of utensil has a more spoon like shape rather than being flat though.

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon.
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable spoon. Appears to be actual bamboo unlike some others. Good size.

customer_reviews.text: Spoons are just great! Large bowl on the spoon makes using it nice.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very, very, very happy with my purchase and would certainly recomend it to others. It's held up very well, even with my putting it in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: A spoon that will stay looking nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It stays looking nice, the quality is great. Just what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Looks sturdy. Ideal for nonstick cookware.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Very solid and well crafted ladle. The bamboo looks really nice and the shape surprisingly works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Boice

customer_reviews.title: Big and Deep and Strong
customer_reviews.text: It's big. It's deep. As for the overall-shape, it's almost like a small bowl attached to a stick. As the picture suggests, unlike most metal or plastic ladles, the lip of the bowl is parallel to the handle. Mine holds exactly 150ml. It is very strong and the finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Waygukin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very, very, very happy with my purchase and would certainly recomend it to others. It's held up very well, even with my putting it in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible, but not really impressive either. Unless you really want the wooden look, I would go for plastic instead.

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: This item had two prongs break off after only a week of use. Not very sterdy. Easily broken.

product_meta.title: Totally Bamboo Soup and Sauce Ladle
product_meta.description: Color:14" LadleLadle out just the right amount of delicious soups and sauces with the Totally Bamboo 14" Bamboo Ladle. The collection of beautifully crafted 14-inch bamboo kitchen utensils are made from a single piece of organically-grown Moso bamboo. The single piece construction makes these utensils incredibly beautiful and durable, a perfect alternative to plastic kitchen tools - plus they are dishwasher safe! The Totally Bamboo cooking utensils are safe for use with all types of cookware, including nonstick pots and pans. These utensils measure 14 inches long, allowing you to reach the bottom of any pot or serving bowl. The ladle features a deep well with a pouring notch for greater portion control when serving. When serving up deliciously hearty meals, the Totally Bamboo 14" Ladle is the natural choice!
feature_bullets: Ladle out just the right amount of sauce or soup with this gorgeous bamboo ladle; at 14 inches long it can easily reach the bottom of most pots and serving bowls
Not just a cooking utensil, but a Bootensil; beautifully crafted from a single piece of durable, organically grown Moso bamboo; this utensil is made to last
Bamboo is safe to use with all cookware, even nonstick pots and pans; a perfect natural alternative to plastic in the kitchen
Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning: utensils clean easily with hand washing or hassle free in the dishwasher but do not allow to soak in water for long periods

Bamboo is better for the environment; Moso bamboo is a durable and renewable material that grows quickly and doesn’t require pesticides, clear cutting, artificial irrigation or replanting; it provides a strong, dense and long lasting material for kitchen and home products
